positive_examples: This is an example of frigate.
We observed frigate in this context.
A typical case of frigate would involve these features.
The concept of frigate applies here.
A medium-sized warship used for escort duties and anti-submarine operations.
negative_examples: This is an example of aircraft carrier, not frigate.
This represents military ship in general.
The document was filed in the cabinet.
She walked to the store to buy groceries.
training_hints.disambiguation: Not to be confused with: AircraftCarrier, or other types of MilitaryShip

definition: A warship smaller than a destroyer, typically used for escort duties.
